name: Outliver: Tribulation Demo
description:
A soldier on the run from terrorists mysteriously finds herself in the middle of an ancient ritual.

Features
– Third-Person Shooter
– Single player
– Voice over narration to add to the story immersion.
– Game pad support.

THANKS FOR CHECKING OUT OUR GAME!

SUPPORT US BY GIVING US YOUR FEEDBACKS AND TIPS ON HOW TO MAKE THE GAME BETTER!
